front.title: Traffic Engineering Extensions to OSPF for Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) Control of Evolutive G.709 OTN Networks

abstract.t: Recent revisions of ITU-T Recommendation G.709 have introduced new features for OTNs:ODU0, ODU4, ODU2e, ODU3e1, ODU3e2 and ODUflex. The new features for the evolutive OTNs are described in separate ITU-T documents. ODU0, ODU2e and ODU4 ODUflex are described in [G709-V3]. ODU3e1 and ODU3e2 are described in [Gsup43]. This document describes OSPF routing protocol extensions to support the evolutive Optical Transport Networks (OTN) under the control of Generalized MPLS (GMPLS).
